name: refeed
tagline: A self-hosted RSS reader with filtering and grouping
description: Refeed is a self-hosted RSS reader with filtering, grouping, and categorization. It provides a responsive UI and is ideal for managing large numbers of RSS feeds.

features.title: Folder Organization
features.description: Group feeds into folders and categories for easier navigation and management

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Create rules to automatically tag, mark as read, or hide articles based on keywords

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find articles across all subscribed feeds using content and title search

features.title: Data Import
features.description: Save important articles for later reference with a favorites system

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Read feeds comfortably on any device with an adaptive, touch-friendly interface
